item.description:
The largest arcade in the world is just a 2 hour drive north of Boston and we're going to go! This will be an afternoon of pinball, video games, mini-golf, bowling, and possibly a train ride. I've heard very good things about this place and have been wanting to try it out for a while now. I hope you can join!

I'll be waiting just outside the entrance or just inside if it's raining or super hot and humid like it has been at 1pm. I'll wait around for 15-20 minutes so we can connect up with the group, make our challenges (DDR anyone?), form mini-golf teams, and then disperse into the largest arcade in the world!

I've had bad luck with arcade-based restaurants in the past, but if it looks decent, maybe we can regroup for an afternoon snack to fuel the gaming.

There's a coupon on their website for free tokens if you buy $20 worth: http://www.funspotnh....

If anyone is driving up with some empty seats in their car and is willing to drive a local sci-fi enthusiast, please say so in the comments. You can help out another group member and the environment by car-pooling at the same time :)

Did I mention this is the largest arcade in the world!
item.name: Largest Arcade in the World!
